allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add dist folder and release zip to git tracking

Remove dist and *.zip from .gitignore so the built extension
files are tracked in the repository.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix auto-sync timer to actually trigger Google Tasks sync

The sync interval timer \(10m/20m/30m\) had an empty callback stub.
Now it properly calls googleTasksService.syncBidirectional\(\) to
push/pull tasks on the configured interval. Added visual status
indicators \(syncing/success/error\) on the sync button.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Remove Calendar Sync, add 20 themes, inline template editing

- Remove redundant Calendar Sync toggle \(tasks with dates already
  sync to Google Calendar via Google Tasks integration\)
- Expand themes from 12 to 20: 8 free + 12 pro with new Aurora,
  Sakura, Volcano, Cyber, Mocha, Nord, Crimson, Indigo themes
- Separate Free/Pro theme sections in settings UI
- Replace all prompt\(\) dialogs with inline forms for template
  editing, new preset creation, and category management
- Templates now support inline name, focus, and break editing

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
